name: 白嫖三国
description:
"Bai Qiao Three Kingdoms" is a card strategy game based on the Three Kingdoms. In the game, the player, as the leader, unlocks more heroes and builds his own army through constant battles. You can recruit heroes, improve equipment, upgrade levels, train troops, and so on to keep your troops competitive.



The game features

* Create your own army

Use their own resources to enhance the strength of their own troops. If you can't beat your opponent, there's no way to unlock subsequent levels and get better resources.



Recruit your favorite heroes

Game players now have hundreds of The Three Kingdoms hero for recruiting, they are not just for fighting machines, each of them will lead the different types of forces, and have their own unique skills, specific between heroes and hero as well as the equipment and will trigger the predestination mechanism, through the tavern to recruit their favorite heroes fight for yourself.



* Special levels, arenas, national battles, world bosses

In addition to ordinary levels and elite levels, there are many famous battles in the history of the three countries to challenge, and you can defeat your opponents through the arena to constantly improve your ranking. Choose one of the Wei, Shu and Wu factions to join the war and confront the other factions. Attack the world BOSS with other players at a specific time for rich resources.



* Unique formation adjustments and troop combinations

Before the battle, you can choose your formation and position based on your own unit and your opponent's unit. Use your formation and unit type to win the battle.



Come and form your own super army! I hope it will bring different surprises to every player who loves the Three Kingdoms.
